name: Crawl Out (lokeyz)
description:
Crawl Out is a dungeon crawler game where a knight must try his best to escape from dungeons that who knows how he got himself into. The current game is in early prototype phase.

The prototype is developed by:

  • Loke Yeng Zhou LinkedIn
  • Supendi LinkedIn
  • Farhan Almandho LinkedIn
  • Toh Hon Jun LinkedIn
  • Muhammad Danial Wahab LinkedIn
